settings.editor: Cocktail attire is a dress code for evening events, such as parties. To dress for it, a suit is ideal. However, you shouldn’t just wear the same old style you wear to work. Instead, your cocktail suit should have a modern feel and be perfect for night-time. As such, a slim-fit, tailored design makes a fantastic option. It should also be dark in color and may even have a sleek sheen to its fabric. To complete your outfit, pair your suit with a dress shirt, polished dress shoes, and a slim tie if you wish. You can add a little flair or personal style with the accessories you choose.
